title: Airdrops, Points, and Fake Agents: A Practical Safety Guide
quickSteps: Start only from the official source.
Do a one-minute page & wallet check.
Claim from a separate, low-balance wallet.
Be strict with bots and mini-apps.
If something went wrong, contain it now.

seo.keywords: crypto airdrop checklist,verify claim domain,wallet drainer approve unlimited,permit signature risk,points farming safety,web3 security
seo.description: A calm, practical guide to avoid airdrop/points scams and shrink blast radius.
